summary: The module contains automated tests for the Lumina text‑to‑image generation pipeline, including quick unit tests that use lightweight dummy components to verify prompt embedding handling and the custom attention forward generator, as well as slower integration tests that run the full pipeline on a GPU to confirm correct inference results.
business_intent: Validate and maintain the correctness and performance of the Lumina text‑to‑image AI pipeline, ensuring reliable generation and early detection of regressions during development.
